questions.text: What state doesn't get the President's jokes?
questions.explanation:
Idaho.

	Leo told Jed this about the press conference he was about to do.

questions.text: Who did the President want beheaded for his birthday?
questions.explanation:
Debby.

	He made the comment after Debby made a sarcastic remark.

questions.text: How many votes did Toby tell Karen the President won by?
questions.explanation:
Three and a half million.

	Karen: "And how many did the President win by?"  Toby: "About three and a half million. He's got a pretty healthy ego, though."

questions.text: Where was the last place Will mentioned that he would like to go on vacation?
questions.explanation:
EPCOT.

	Will listed off all these places that he wanted to go on vacation after he got Sam settled in California. Epcot was the last place he mentioned.

questions.text: Who doesn't like pets with human names?
questions.explanation:
Leo & Leo McGarry.

	Leo told the President this when they were talking about the pets that Zoey, Ellie and Elizabeth had as children.

questions.text: How old was the boy that needed the heart and lung operation?
questions.explanation:
Fifteen.

	The boy was the son of the Iranian Ayatollah.

questions.text: Whose heart and lungs did the President want to give the boy?
Who was the First Lady with when the President wanted to talk to her?
questions.explanation:
Women's Caucus.

	President (to Charlie): "Put on a helmet and pads and get in there."

questions.text: Who wanted Sam to run away from the President?
questions.explanation:
The President.

	Sam (to the President): "I would never, Mr. President. I simply would never do that. That's not how I'm getting votes."

questions.text: Who was going to be Sam's campaign manager?
questions.explanation:
Scott.

	Will told Sam and the press this news at the same time.
